FuncDef: This command applies a protection template name to an MPLS-TP LSP that the protect path is configured under. If the template is applied, then MPLS-TP 1:1 linear protection is enabled on the LSP, using the parameters specified in the named template.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies at text string for the template up to 32 characters in printable 7-bit ASCII, enclosed in double quotes.
